## Focused on layout ...

```{.yaml filename="custom.scss"}

/*-- scss:defaults --*/

/*-- scss:defaults --*/
$foi-blue: #1F2945; // FOI Blå (primary)
$foi-light-blue: #1C96D1; // FOI Ljusblå (secondary) 
$foi-red: #9F2842; // FOI Röd (tertiary)
$foi-gray: #76777A; // FOI Grå
$foi-green: #979600; // FOI Grön  
$foi-purple: #6C3B5D; // FOI Lila

$body-bg: rgb(255, 255, 255);
$table-striped-bg: rgb(244, 244, 244);
$table-hover-bg: var(--bs-secondary);

/*-- scss:rules --*/
:root {
    --foi-blue: #{$foi-blue};
    --foi-light-blue: #{$foi-light-blue};
    --foi-red: #{$foi-red};
    --foi-gray: #{$foi-gray};
    --foi-green: #{$foi-green};
    --foi-purple: #{$foi-purple};

    --primary-color: var(--foi-blue);
    --secondary-color: var(--foi-light-blue);
    --tertiary-color: var(--foi-red);
    --text-dark: #212529;
    --text-light: #ffffff;
}


/*-- scss:rules --*/

.table {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.table th,
.table thead th {
    background-color: #1C96D1 !important;
    /* Fallback color */
    color: var(--bs-primary, #212529) !important;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.table-striped>tbody>tr:nth-of-type(odd)>td {
    background-color: $table-striped-bg;
}

/* Custom styling for kable tables */
.table-responsive {
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

h1,
h2,
h3 {
    color: var(--bs-primary);
}

/* Table of Contents - "On this page" */
.toc-title {
    color: var(--foi-blue) !important;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.table-of-contents {
    border-left: 3px solid var(--foi-light-blue);
}

.table-of-contents a {
    color: var(--foi-blue) !important;
    text-decoration: none;
}

.table-of-contents a:hover {
    color: var(--foi-light-blue) !important;
}

.table-of-contents .active {
    color: var(--foi-red) !important;
    font-weight: bold;
}

```
